gwendolyncrclclient

Class Globals

  • java.lang.Object
    • gwendolyncrclclient.Globals

  • public class Globals
extends java.lang.Object
    Globals is a wrapper for global flags and other general purpose utilities.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean bLoopback
      a flag to signal a non-crcl sockdt reading application - uses self inferencing and "smart" object guesses as to gear picked up and placed in an open kitting slot.
      static boolean bReadAllInstances
      a flag to signal if all the object instances in the model status have been read at least once.
      static crcl.base.CommandStateEnumType crclCommandStatus
      current crcl command status.
      static long curStatusCmdId
      current status command id returned from CRCL socket report.
      static long latestCmdId
      latest command id sent in crcl command
      static java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock mutex
      mutex for thread safe updating

    • Method Detail

      • convertTranPose

        public static rcs.posemath.PmPose convertTranPose(java.lang.String tran)
        convertTranPose accept a string with three doubles and uses these doubles as the translation. It creates a pose using this translation with zero rotation.
        Parameters:
        tran - string with 3 comma separated doubles
        Returns:
        a PmPose containing the trans or null if the string was illegal.
